title: [GAMEPLAY] Redeemed Riven death animation with Gaurdian Angel
body: If Redeemed Riven is equipped with Guardian Angel her death animation won't  display correctly while resurrecting

replies.body: Hey! I just took a look at this in game, and I'm not able to get a repro. Would you mind grabbing be a screenshot/video? :)
Just to clarify on this. Its just a visual bug and not exclusive to Redeemed Riven. I've seen it happen with a lot of champions and skins on very rare occasions. No idea what causes though.

> [{quoted}](name=LuluxAnnieYuri,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=fNvG9hoH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-10T18:43:08.710+0000)
>
> Just to clarify on this. Its just a visual bug and not exclusive to Redeemed Riven. I've seen it happen with a lot of champions and skins on very rare occasions. No idea what causes though.

Okie, thanks for the additional context!
